items.title: Google Search Could Change Forever in the UK
items.description: New regulation from the UK’s competition authority means Google may be forced to make major changes in the way that people use its search engine.

items.title: The Best Vacuum for Pet Hair—We Tested a Dozen Models to Find Which Work Best (2025)
items.description: Cordless, handheld, robot, and traditional—we tested them all to find the vacuum that’s fantastic for fur.

items.description: Ready to move on from the traditional glass slab? Introduce a hinge into your life with these folding smartphones.

items.description: These WIRED-tested wearables reduce your reliance on a phone while keeping you connected.

items.title: Proton VPN Review (2025): The Best VPN for Most People
items.description: Proton VPN has a low price, an excellent privacy track record, and blistering speeds. What more could you ask for?
